sqlQuery.name: CompoundsFromMetabolicPathways
sqlQuery.sql: WITH enzy AS (SELECT distinct ec.ec_number FROM apidbtuning.geneAttributes gf, dots.aaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec WHERE asec.aa_sequence_id = gf.aa_sequence_id AND ec.enzyme_class_id = asec.enzyme_class_id) SELECT distinct Subtrs.source_id as source_id, Prds.products, Subtrs.substrates, Subtrs.Enzyme, CASE when Subtrs.Enzyme in (select ec_number from enzy) THEN '' || Subtrs.enzyme || '' ELSE Subtrs.Enzyme END AS enzyme_link, '' || Subtrs.reaction || '' as reaction, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, case when Subtrs.dir = 0 then 'Reversible' else 'Irreversible' end as direction From (--Prods SELECT x.enzyme, x.dir, x.source_id, x.reaction , apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT( prod ) AS apidb.varchartab))) AS products FROM ( select CASE WHEN (pubchem.compound = nn2.display_label) THEN '' || pubchem.compound || '' ELSE nn2.display_label END AS prod, nn1.display_label as enzyme, nrt.display_name as reaction, nrc.source_node as dir, n.name as source_id from ApiDB.NetworkNode nn1, ApiDB.NetworkNode nn2, ApiDB.networkrelationship nr, ApiDB.networkrelationshiptype nrt, ApiDB.NetworkRelContext nrc, ApiDB.NetworkContext n, ApiDB.NetworkRelContextLink nrl, (select pc.compound_source_id, pc.compound from ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc ) pubchem where nn1.node_type_id = 1 and nn1.display_label not like '%X:_Y:' and nr.node_id = nn1.network_node_id and nr.associated_node_id = nn2.network_node_id and nrc.network_relationship_id = nr.network_relationship_id and nrt.network_relationship_type_id = nrc.network_relationship_type_id and nrl.network_rel_context_id = nrc.network_rel_context_id and nrc.network_context_id = n.network_context_id and nn2.display_label = pubchem.compound (+) group by n.name, nrt.display_name, nn1.display_label, nrc.source_node ,pubchem.compound ,nn2.display_label,pubchem.compound_source_id ) x group by x.enzyme, x.dir, x.source_id, x.reaction) Prds, ( --Substrs SELECT x.enzyme, x.dir, x.source_id, x.reaction , apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT( substr) AS apidb.varchartab))) AS substrates FROM ( select CASE WHEN (pubchem.compound = nn2.display_label) THEN '' || pubchem.compound || '' ELSE nn2.display_label END AS substr, nn1.display_label as enzyme, nrt.display_name as reaction, nrc.source_node as dir, n.name as source_id from ApiDB.NetworkNode nn1, ApiDB.NetworkNode nn2, ApiDB.networkrelationship nr, ApiDB.networkrelationshiptype nrt, ApiDB.NetworkRelContext nrc, ApiDB.NetworkContext n, ApiDB.NetworkRelContextLink nrl, (select pc.compound_source_id, pc.compound from ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc ) pubchem where nn1.node_type_id = 1 and nn1.display_label not like '%X:_Y:' and nr.associated_node_id = nn1.network_node_id and nr.node_id = nn2.network_node_id and nrc.network_relationship_id = nr.network_relationship_id and nrt.network_relationship_type_id = nrc.network_relationship_type_id and nrl.network_rel_context_id = nrc.network_rel_context_id and nrc.network_context_id = n.network_context_id and nn2.display_label = pubchem.compound (+) group by n.name, nrt.display_name, nn1.display_label, nrc.source_node ,pubchem.compound ,nn2.display_label,pubchem.compound_source_id) x group by x.enzyme, x.dir, x.source_id, x.reaction) Subtrs Where Subtrs.dir = Prds.dir And Prds.reaction = Subtrs.reaction And Subtrs.enzyme = Prds.enzyme And Subtrs.source_id = Prds.source_id

sqlQuery.name: PathwayGraphs
sqlQuery.sql: select source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, display_name, internal || '&template=' || decode(is_graph_custom, 'true', 0, 1) as internal, xaxis_description from apidb.pathway, (select '*** Default ***' as display_name, '' as internal, '' as is_graph_custom, '' as xaxis_description, '' as project_id from dual -- TEMPLATE_ANCHOR pathwayGraphs ) Where project_id = '@PROJECT_ID@' AND NOT internal LIKE '%MassSpec%'

sqlQuery.name: ECNumberOrganismMap
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT DISTINCT p.source_id as source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, ec.ec_number as display_label, (pn.x - (pn.width/2)) as x1, (pn.y - (pn.height/2)) as y1, (pn.x + (pn.width/2)) as x2, (pn.y + (pn.height/2)) as y2, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(ga.organism) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') as organisms, apidb.tab_to_string(set(cast(COLLECT(ga.source_id) AS apidb.varchartab)), ', ') as genes FROM ApidbTuning.GenomicSequence gs, apidb.pathway p, apidb.pathwaynode pn, dots.aaSequenceEnzymeClass asec, sres.enzymeClass ec,ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga WHERE gs.na_sequence_id = ga.na_sequence_id AND ga.aa_sequence_id = asec.aa_sequence_id AND asec.enzyme_class_id = ec.enzyme_class_id AND p.pathway_id = pn.parent_id AND ec.ec_number = pn.display_label group by p.source_id, ec.ec_number, pn.x, pn.y,pn.width, pn.height

sqlQuery.name: CompoundLabel
sqlQuery.sql: Select p.source_id, pc.compound_source_id, '@PROJECT_ID@' as project_id, pn.display_label, pn.x, pn.y, pn.height as radius From ApiDB.Pathway p, ApiDB.PathwayNode pn, ApiDBTuning.PathwayCompounds pc Where p.pathway_id = pn.parent_id And pn.pathway_node_type_id = 2 AND pn.display_label = pc.compound Group By p.source_id, pc.compound_source_id, pn.display_label, pn.x, pn.y, pn.height, pn.width
